announcement.name: AppSec - Notification Banner
announcement.summary: Starting in Paris, ISC users can now subscribe to security email notifications. Begin updating by selecting Notification Preferences under your profile menu.
announcement.title: Configure Security Notifications

sys_update_version.name: announcement_585e766987aa05509bc4ddb83cbb3521
